commodities.commodity
Class Commodity

java.lang.Object
  commodities.commodity.Commodity
public class Commodity
extends Object

Commodity is an object that contains the basic information about a commodity regardless of delivery (contract). This window is divided into four main parts...

Version:
1.0
Author:
J.R. Titko
Updated:
2004.11.11

JAN

public static final int JAN
Bit map for the month of January. This is used as a mask to the valid months of a commoidity.

Constructor Detail

Commodity

public Commodity(String symbol,
                 String exchange,
                 String name,
                 String unitType,
                 int unitSize,
                 String unitPrice,
                 double tickSize,
                 double tickPrice,
                 int tickDailyLimit,
                 int margin,
                 int displayDecimals)
Creates a new commodity with the minimum amount of information required when setting up a new commodity.

Parameters:
symbol - The symbol for the commodity
exchange - The exchange that the commodity is traded on
name - The name of the commodity
unitType - The type of units the contract is measured in
unitSize - The number of units in a contract
unitPrice - The type of units the prices is recorded in (cents, dollars, etc)
tickSize - The size of a single tick
tickPrice - The monetary value of a tick
tickDailyLimit - The maximum number of ticks a commodity may move in a day
margin - The standard price of a contract for this commodity
displayDecimals - The number of decimal places to display

Commodity

public Commodity(String symbol,
                 String exchange,
                 String name,
                 String unitType,
                 int unitSize,
                 String unitPrice,
                 double tickSize,
                 double tickPrice,
                 int tickDailyLimit,
                 int margin,
                 int displayDecimals,
                 int tradeMonthMask)
Creates a new commodity with a mask of commodity trading months. The mask is a representation of what months can be traded by using the constant variables for the months in a binary or (|).

Parameters:
symbol - The symbol for the commodity
exchange - The exchange that the commodity is traded on
name - The name of the commodity
unitType - The type of units the contract is measured in
unitSize - The number of units in a contract
unitPrice - The type of units the prices is recorded in (cents, dollars, etc)
tickSize - The size of a single tick
tickPrice - The monetary value of a tick
tickDailyLimit - The maximum number of ticks a commodity may move in a day
margin - The standard margin of a contract for this commodity
displayDecimals - The number of decimal places to display
tradeMonthMask - The months that this commodity is traded in

Commodity

public Commodity(String symbol,
                 String exchange,
                 String name,
                 String unitType,
                 int unitSize,
                 String unitPrice,
                 double tickSize,
                 double tickPrice,
                 int tickDailyLimit,
                 int margin,
                 int displayDecimals,
                 String openOutcrySymbol,
                 String acmSymbol,
                 int tradeMonthMask)
Creates a new commodity with the open outcry symbol, acm symbol, and a mask of commodity trading months. The mask is a representation of what months can be traded by using the constant variables for the months in a binary or (|).

Parameters:
symbol - The symbol for the commodity
exchange - The exchange that the commodity is traded on
name - The name of the commodity
unitType - The type of units the contract is measured in
unitSize - The number of units in a contract
unitPrice - The type of units the prices is recorded in (cents, dollars, etc)
tickSize - The size of a single tick
tickPrice - The monetary value of a tick
tickDailyLimit - The maximum number of ticks a commodity may move in a day
margin - The standard margin of a contract for this commodity
displayDecimals - The number of decimal places to display
openOutcrySymbol - The symbol used for open outcry
acmSymbol - The symbol used for the ACM
tradeMonthMask - The months that this commodity is traded in

Commodity

public Commodity(String symbol,
                 String exchange,
                 String name,
                 String unitType,
                 int unitSize,
                 String unitPrice,
                 double tickSize,
                 double tickPrice,
                 int tickDailyLimit,
                 int margin,
                 int displayDecimals,
                 String openOutcrySymbol,
                 String acmSymbol,
                 int tradeMonthMask,
                 String databaseSymbol)
Creates a new commodity with the open outcry symbol, acm symbol, and a mask of commodity trading months. The mask is a representation of what months can be traded by using the constant variables for the months in a binary or (|).

Parameters:
symbol - The symbol for the commodity
exchange - The exchange that the commodity is traded on
name - The name of the commodity
unitType - The type of units the contract is measured in
unitSize - The number of units in a contract
unitPrice - The type of units the prices is recorded in (cents, dollars, etc)
tickSize - The size of a single tick
tickPrice - The monetary value of a tick
tickDailyLimit - The maximum number of ticks a commodity may move in a day
margin - The standard margin of a contract for this commodity
displayDecimals - The number of decimal places to display
openOutcrySymbol - The symbol used for open outcry
acmSymbol - The symbol used for the ACM
tradeMonthMask - The months that this commodity is traded in
databaseSymbol - The special symbol used for DB access

getTradeMonthMask

public int getTradeMonthMask()
Get the months the commodity is traded as a series of bits. Use the month constants (JAN, FEB, MAR, APR, MAY, JUN, JUL, AUG, SEP, OCT, NOV, DEC) to check if a month is traded for this commodity.

Returns:
the bit representation of the trading months

Returns:
the special DB symbol for the commodity

getDatabaseCommoditySymbol

public String getDatabaseCommoditySymbol()
Get the special DB symbol for database access or the commodity symbol if there is no special DB symbol.

Returns:
the special DB symbol or commodity symbol for the commodity

addContract

public Contract addContract(String contractMonth)
Adds a new contract to the commodity. This contract will be stored.

Parameters:
contractMonth - the month of the contract in 'YYYYM'
Returns:
the contract added or the original contract

Adds a new contract to the commodity.

Parameters:
contract - contract to add

loadContracts

private void loadContracts()
Load the contracts that go with this commodity into memory.

formatPrice

public String formatPrice(double price)
Format a price to the appropriate number of decimal places so that the number of decimal places are fixed even if they end in zeros.

Parameters:
price - the price to be formatted
Returns:
the formatted price

bySymbol

public static Commodity bySymbol(String symbol)
Retrieve a Commodity object by using the commodity symbol.

Parameters:
symbol - the commodity symbol
Returns:
a Commodity object of the requested commodity

public static Commodity byNameExchange(String nameExchange)

Parameters:
nameExchange - the commodity name and exchange
Returns:
a Commodity object of the requested commodity

getNameMap

public static Map getNameMap()
Retrieve a map keyed on the names of the available commodities with Commodity objects as associated values.

Returns:
a map containing all Commodities keyed by name

loadTable

private static void loadTable()
Load the Commodity table and store it to be keyed by symbol.
